document.full_text: "let me be crystal clear," barclays' star investment banker and new chief executive bob diamond told members of the british parliament in january. "we are going to be here in the united kingdom, and this is the place that we want to succeed."
document.title: special report: why london can live without its big banks
lines_and_colors: "let me be crystal clear," barclays' star investment banker and new chief executive bob diamond told members of the british parliament in january. "we are going to be here in the united kingdom, and this is the place that we want to succeed."
